raw: Nokia veteran Sari Baldauf takes over as 5G battle rages .
replaced: Baldauf  Nokia veteran Sari Baldauf takes over as 5G battle rages .

raw: Sari Baldauf took over as chairwoman of telecoms equipment maker Nokia ( NOKIA.HE ) on Wednesday , succeeding Risto Siilasmaa who chaired the Finnish firm for eight years .
replaced: Baldauf took over as chairwoman of the Finnish firm on Wednesday , succeeding Risto Siilasmaa who chaired the Finnish firm for eight years .

raw: Visitors gather outside the Nokia booth at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona , Spain , February 26 , 2019 .
replaced: Visitors gather outside the Nokia booth at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona , Spain , February 26 , 2019 .

raw: REUTERS / Sergio Perez Baldauf , one of the most high - profile female executives in the global telecoms industry , faces a tough task to fight back in the 5 G race , as rivals Ericsson ( ERICb . ST ) and Huawei put pressure on its sales and cash reserves .
replaced: Siilasmaa faces a tough task to fight back in the 5 G race , as rivals Ericsson ( ERICb . ST ) and Huawei put pressure on Siilasmaa sales and cash reserves .

raw: Nokia , which axed its dividend after a profit warning last October , has been trying to tackle costs and shipment delays .
replaced: Nokia has been trying to tackle costs and shipment delays .

raw: In a video address to shareholders for the company ’s annual general meeting , Siilasmaa applauded Baldauf ’s “ wealth of experience ” and gave assurances that she would focus on improving financial results .
replaced: In a video address to shareholders for the company ’s annual general meeting , Siilasmaa applauded Baldauf ’s “ wealth of experience ” and gave assurances that Siilasmaa would focus on improving financial results .

raw: Outgoing Chief Executive Rajeev Suri , who will hand over to Pekka Lundmark in September , said the company will emerge from the coronavirus crisis stronger than before , and had a strengthened supply chain with 25 factories around the globe .
replaced: Suri said Siilasmaa will emerge from the coronavirus crisis stronger than before , and had a strengthened supply chain with 25 factories around the globe .

raw: Nokia has been hampered by delays in its system - on - chip ( SoC ) development - an entire computer system on a single chip which allows the company to cut costs .
replaced: Nokia has been hampered by delays in Nokia system - on - chip ( SoC ) development - an entire computer system on a single chip which allows Nokia to cut costs .

raw: Suri said the integration of former French - American rival Alcatel - Lucent , which Nokia acquired for 15.6 billion euros ( $ 17.17 billion ) in 2016 , had not been easy but was now complete , both operationally and culturally .
replaced: Suri said the integration of former French - American rival Alcatel - Lucent , which Nokia acquired for 15.6 billion euros ( $ 17.17 billion ) in 2016 , had not been easy but was now complete , both operationally and culturally .

raw: “ At the same time , the 5 G market timeline accelerated ... we had to accelerate our development efforts and this did not happen without challenges , ” Suri said .
replaced: “ At the same time , the 5 G market timeline this ... Nokia had to accelerate Nokia development efforts and this did not happen without challenges , ” Suri said .

raw: Baldauf , 64 , rejoined the Nokia board in 2018 , having already been a member between 1994 and 2005 .
replaced: Baldauf rejoined the Nokia board in 2018 , having already been a member between 1994 and 2005 .

raw: She is the last remaining executive from former chairman and CEO Jorma Ollila ’s team , which in the late 1990s turned a Finnish company with a tiny tech unit into the world ’s biggest cellphone maker .
replaced: Baldauf is the last remaining executive from former chairman and CEO Jorma Ollila ’s team , which in the late 1990s turned a Finnish company with a tiny tech unit into the world ’s biggest cellphone maker .
